sql.if: and title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or content like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

mapper.select: select board.post_id,board.category_id,board.title,board.content,hit,board.user_id,board.created_day,board.updated_day, (select count(*) from comments com where com.post_id=board.post_id)comcnt, (select count(post_id) from vote vo where vo.post_id=board.post_id)vocnt, (select p.src_name from users u, profileimg p where u.profile_id = p.profile_id and board.user_id = u.user_id)post_profile from board_post board where board.post_id=#{post_id}
mapper.update: update board_post set hit=hit+1 where post_id=#{post_id}
mapper.select:
select NVL(count(*),0) cnt from board_post
and category_id = #{category} and subcate = #{subcate}

select board.category_id,board.title,board.created_day,board.post_id, (select category_name from board_category cate where cate.category_id=board.category_id)cname, (select NVL(count(*),0) from comments com where com.post_id=board.post_id)comcnt, (select NVL(count(post_id),0) from vote vo where vo.post_id=board.post_id)vocnt from board_post board where rownum<=10 order by board.created_day desc

select board.category_id,board.title,board.created_day,board.post_id, (select NVL(count(*),0) from comments com where com.post_id=board.post_id)comcnt, (select NVL(count(post_id),0) from vote vo where vo.post_id=board.post_id)vocnt from board_post board where rownum<=10 order by vocnt desc
mapper.update: update board_post set content=#{content},updated_day=sysdate where post_id=#{post_id}
mapper.select: select board.category_id,board.title,board.created_day,board.post_id, (select category_name from board_category cate where cate.category_id=board.category_id)cname, (select NVL(count(*),0) from comments com where com.post_id=board.post_id)comcnt, (select NVL(count(post_id),0) from vote vo where vo.post_id=board.post_id)vocnt from board_post board where rownum<=6 and user_id=#{user_id} order by board.created_day desc
select * from comments where user_id=#{user_id} and rownum<=5

select board.title,(select category_name from board_category cate where cate.category_id=board.category_id)cname from board_post board where board.subcate=1 and rownum<=4 order by board.created_day desc

select * from (select b.*, (select NVL(count(b.post_id),0) from vote v where v.post_id=b.post_id)voCnt,rownum rnum from board_post b where category_id = #{category_id} and subcate = 1 order by created_day) a where rnum >=1 and rnum <= 3
select * from board_post where user_id=#{user_id} and rownum<=6 order by created_day desc
